name: Volatility-Weighted Keltner Mean Reversion
description: Daily mean-reversion strategy for liquid U.S. equities. Uses a volatility-weighted Keltner Channel (ATR-based, scaled by 14-day return volatility) with RSI confirmation. Long entries when price closes below lower band & RSI(14)<40; shorts when price closes above upper band & RSI(14)>60. Exits when price reverts to 20-day SMA or RSI returns to 45-55. Risk capped to 2 % of equity per trade, ATR-based stops (1.5× ATR) and targets (1.0× ATR).
